name: Water Sort - Color Puzzle Game
description:
Water Sort: Game Puzzle is the ultimate challenge for your sorting skills! In this fun and addictive game, your goal is to sort different colored waters into the correct bottles. With increasing difficulty levels and various obstacles, this game will test your abilities and keep you entertained for hours.
Get ready for a splash of fun with Water Sort: Game Puzzle! Download now and start sorting!


How to play:
• Tap any bottle to pour the water to another bottle.
• The requirement for pouring the water is that it must be the same color and there should be sufficient room in the glass
